title: while-condition
description: This schema defines the 'while' conditional logic that can be used within the workflow of the playbook. In addition to the inherited properties, this section defines three additional specific properties that are valid for this type.

type.description: The value of this property MUST be 'while-condition'.

condition.description: A boolean expression as defined in the STIX Patterning Grammar that while it is true executes the workflow step identified by 'on_true' otherwise it exits the while conditional workflow step and executes the 'on_false' workflow step

on_true.description: The step ID to be processed every time the loop condition evaluates as true. The ID MUST represent a CACAO workflow step object.

on_false.description: The ID of the next step to be processed if the loop condition evaluates as false. The ID MUST represent a CACAO workflow step object.
